TextEng: "I'll be going now."
"I'm just here to kill you!"
"We'll see about that!" <StartAction>Attack her.</Start>
"Invulnerable? What are you talking about?"
"I'm looking for pieces of a broken mirror."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"Who are you?"
"I think I'll just kill you now."
Text: "그냥 지금 죽이는 게 나을 것 같은데."

TextEng: "What do you mean, you're invulnerable?"
"There's something strange going on here."
"The drow came to see you?"
"Mirror? What mirror?"
"I'm looking for allies to join me against the Valsharess."
"Why would a Queen want to live in a cave?"
"Isn't a Queen's duty to lead her people?"
"I want to ask you some questions."
"Tell me about that mirror you mentioned."
"Where is the mirror now?"
"Maybe if we fix the mirror we can save your town."
Text: "거울을 고치면 네 마을을 구할 수 있을지도 몰라."

TextEng: "You gave it away? To who?"
"Why would you give it away?"
"Seems like you're trying to stir up trouble between me and this drow."
Text: "나랑 그 드로우 사이를 이간질하려는 것 같은데."

TextEng: "Do you know where I can find any of the other pieces?"
"Is there anything I can do to help?"
"I've decided I'm going to kill you."
"Can I ask you something else?"
"How can you turn your back on your people like this?"
